page.title: 14Village Hall- Russells Water
page.content: The Village Hall which is situated at Russells Water serves the people of the surrounding communities within Swyn- combe Parish. It is managed by a rep- resentative committee of approx. ten people, and it is maintained by fund- raising, covenants and goodwill. Uses are:- 1. Fortnightly Bingo sessions on Thursday evening with an average attendance of 25 people, mainly elderly 2. Monthly Silver Threads group for over 60's on Thursday afternoons. Out- ings are also organised. 3. Monthly meetings during the Winter in the evenings, open to all ages and with speakers to cover subjects of general interest. 4. Christmas Dinner for all Senior Cit- izens of Swyncombe Parish given by mem- bers of the Hall Committee and helpers. The Hall is also let, with discretion, for private functions.
